62.ara-name: كتاب فضائل أصحاب النبى صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Humran bin Aban:Muawiya said (to the people), "You offer a prayer which we, who were the companions of the Prophet (ﷺ) never saw the Prophet (ﷺ) offering, and he forbade its offering," i.e. the two rak`at after the compulsory `Asr prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرُ مُعَاوِيَةَ رضى الله عنه
chapter.eng-name: Narration about Mu'awiya رضي الله عنه
